resources.string: Data on your driving style is being collected
An error occurred while scoring your driving style. \nTry again.
Error of gps location service response. \nTry again.
Car price should be more than € 5000.
For an accurate scoring of your driving style, \nthe GPS signal strength should be more than 90%.
For an accurate scoring of your driving style, \nmake at least a five-minute trip.

This application is a part of kasko2go complex product and demonstrates only basic telematics functionality.\nDue to demo purpose, all information is given simplified and should be used as a reference only.\nEnjoy your safe ride!
Check your driving style \nand see how much you save.
Data on your driving style is being collected.

Take a trip five to thirty minutes in duration.

At the end of the trip, tap Stop, and we will evaluate your driving style.

Position your phone so that the GPS signal level is at least 90%.
The GPS reception is below 90%. The condition is not met;\nthe calculation will not be made.
Congrats!\nYou have a good driving style.
Alas, your driving style is not safe.
The cost is an indication so that you can assess potential savings.
You’ve scored above 80, \nyou will receive a reward.
Score 80 or more to get a reward.
Three simple steps to get a reward:
2. Share our Telegram channel. \n \n3. Become a good driver and get €5 in ETH.
